alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 24 at 11:26PM ChST until September 25 at 1:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CHST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Central to northern parts of Guam. * WHEN...Until 115 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1123 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.4 and 0.6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Andersen AFB, Mongmong-Toto-Maite and Sinajana. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
